tool.name: OpenNLP Constituency Parser
tool.help:
**What it does**
Performs a constituency parse of a text in a LIF container using the `OpenNLP <https://opennlp.apache.org>`_ parser (see the `OpenNLP -- Parser Tutorial <https://www.tutorialspoint.com/opennlp/opennlp_parsing_the_sentences.htm>`_ for more information).
**Required annotations**
* `Sentence <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Sentence.html>`_ (LIF)
**Generated Annotations**
A LIF document containing:
1. `PhraseStructure <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/PhraseStructure.html>`_ annotations #. `Constituent <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Constituent.html>`_ annotations)
.. class:: infomark
The parse tree can be visualized with the Brat visualizer tool.
